attributes.action: Kick Great Western Railways in to making a change! They offer no condolences!
attributes.background: "Signalling problems" occurring daily, standing in the cold waiting for an expensive service that never delivers and cares only for payday! Complaints have been filed; the company themselves won't take liability or offer support so maybe a government kick up the backside will sort these delays out!

rejection.details: You could start a new petition asking for the Government to end Great Western's rail franchise, if that's what you would like to happen.
